players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie's death is a huge blow to our town. We need to figure out who did this and make sure they don't strike again."
Bob: "Let's focus on finding the real killer and not jumping to conclusions. We can't trust Alice, but we need concrete evidence before accusing them."
You: "I'm innocent, I swear. Charlie was a good friend of mine and I would never hurt them."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)

players.name: Bob
